text: “Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn ighiar kam Josua ko Moses, gua mɨkɨmtɨ, gua uaning bagh an osirigh. Egh Moses, nɨ an Israelian gumazamizibar sure damightɨ, a men navir averiabar ikɨtɨ, me zurara ighiar kamɨn akabagh nɨghnɨgh, fogh suam, kɨ guizbangɨra ikiangsɨzir kam me ganɨga ghaze, me na ataghɨraghsɨ nɨghnɨghan kogham.
